products.title: Splash Indigo Blue Roller Blind
products.description: Their splash range of fabrics are both beautiful & contemporary. This dark blue, almost navy, roller blind is a very stylish, on trend colour choice. Their roller blinds come with various control options, including a spring acorn pull which removes the need for a control chain, making it inherently child safe. Their splash indigo blue roller fabric is also moisture resistant which means it is the best choice for bathrooms and kitchens.

products.title: Splash Sloe Purple Roller Blind
products.description: This beautiful and elegant range comes in a variety of colours to choose from that will look good in any room. Their splash sloe roller blind in an attractive purple colour is a perfect choice to help you transform your space. Product id: sdb-rbx1575 fabric colour: sloe material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes splash sloe purple roller blind in purple.

products.title: Splash Orchid Purple Roller Blind
products.description: Splash orchid purple is a lush purple/pink shade roller blind perfect for adding a stylish, modern finish to your home. This light-filtering, dim-out fabric is the perfect choice whether you are refreshing a tired looking window or moving into a new home. This fabulous made to measure roller blind is great for adding a splash of colour into kitchens, as this fabric is moisture-resistant product id: sdb-rbx2073 fabric colour: orchid purple material: 100% polyester headrail: durable aluminium roller tube supported by white steel brackets - top, face or side fix control type: smooth continuous-looped chain energy saving rating: er2 - medium energy saving value - effective thermal retention light filtering: yes splash orchid purple roller blind in purple.

products.title: Splash Smokey Purple Roller Blind
products.description: Their best-selling splash range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish, the fabric offers wonderful light filtering properties in addition to this is also moisture resistant. This range of fabrics are the perfect choice for kitchens, bathrooms & en-suites. This dark smokey purple roller blind will brighten any room and offers wonderful light filtering properties meaning you can can achieve complete privacy without completely blocking light from coming into the room.

products.title: Splash Indigo Roller Blind
products.description: This slightly textured, dim-out fabric will bring a splash of colour to an interior. Available in many colours and blackout options available in the bella range. Splash indigo roller blind available from leading blinds supplier kingston blinds direct. Order a free sample and get an instant price online.
